```{=html}

<style>
.lex-tabs { display:flex; gap:.35rem; margin: 0 0 1rem 0; flex-wrap: wrap; }
.lex-tabbtn {
  border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.15);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,.03);
  padding: .35rem .6rem;
  border-radius: .5rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  user-select: none;
}
.lex-tabbtn[aria-selected="true"] { background: rgba(0,0,0,.10); }

.lex-title { margin-top: 0.25rem; }

.lex-panel { display: none; }
.lex-panel[data-active="true"] { display:block; }

.lex-controls { display:flex; gap:.75rem; align-items:center; flex-wrap: wrap; margin: .75rem 0 1rem 0; }
.lex-controls label { font-weight: 600; }
.lex-controls select { border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.2); border-radius: .5rem; padding: .35rem .5rem; max-width: 16rem; width: 100%; }

.lex-pos-section { margin: 0 0 1.25rem 0; }
.lex-pos-title { font-size: 1.15rem; margin: 0 0 .5rem 0; }

.lex-list { list-style: none; padding-left: 0; margin: 0; display: grid; gap: .5rem; }
.lex-item { border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.12); border-radius: .75rem; padding: .5rem .65rem; }
.lex-word { display:inline-block; font-weight: 700; background: none; border: none; padding: 0; cursor: pointer; text-align: left; }
.lex-word:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
.lex-paradigm { margin-top: .4rem; display: none; }
.lex-paradigm[data-open="true"] { display:block; }

table.lex-kv { border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; }
table.lex-kv th, table.lex-kv td { padding: .15rem 0; vertical-align: top; }
.lex-pron{
  font-style: italic !important;
}
.lex-audio{
  transform: scale(0.75);
  transform-origin: left center;
  height: 28px; /* leave normal; scale does the shrinking */
}


</style>

<div class="lex-tabs" role="tablist" aria-label="Lexicon views">
  <button class="lex-tabbtn" role="tab" id="tab-ch" aria-controls="panel-ch" aria-selected="false" type="button">By chapter</button>
  <button class="lex-tabbtn" role="tab" id="tab-all" aria-controls="panel-all" aria-selected="true" type="button">All words</button>
</div>

<h1 class="lex-title">Lexicon</h1>

<section id="panel-all" class="lex-panel" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="tab-all" data-active="true">
  <div id="lexAllContainer"></div>
</section>

<section id="panel-ch" class="lex-panel" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="tab-ch" data-active="false">
  <div class="lex-controls">
    <label for="lexChapter">Chapter</label>
    <select id="lexChapter"></select>
  </div>
  <div id="lexListCh"></div>
</section>

<script src="./assets/js/lexicon.js"></script>
```
